channel.title: Axoloti Nanosequencer
channel.description: Axoloti + Korg Nanokontrol 2 sequencing Yamaha Reface CS. Axoloti based sequencer: 8 steps, 3 lines of sequencer. Each line has individual control of: Resolution, backwards and forward, Octave up/down, note lenght (gate), swing and velocity. The sequence could be transposable via Midi in note of the synth. Its based on external led control possibilities of Korg Nanokontrol 2, that allows this visual sequencer. It could run free or synced by Midi in clock. I also developed an subpatch object that allows to use button + knob to acces to diffenent functions. Also keep the value of the knob and wait to reach this value to get on. This object increases the possibilities a lot I´m thinking on next goals for this proyect: -Scale selection -Transpose in the same scale (not transposing the scale) -More than 3 rate possibilities for sequence -Random playing -Gate per note -Sequence Length selectable Sequencer nanokontrol-eigth.axp (49.3 KB) I think this subpatch objets will be needed Dual KnobX3-OK.axs (12.2 KB) sequencer8steps.axs (8.6 KB) https://youtu.be/7ihXqrhF73w

item.title: Axoloti Nanosequencer
item.dc:creator: @Heyjmw Heyjmw
item.description:
@Heyjmw wrote:

This is awesome. I've been using my axoloti to add features to my reface YC. Now that I see what can be done with a Nanokontrol, I'm going to dust mine off and try some stuff. Great project, Spart!

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti Nanosequencer
item.dc:creator: @Spart Jose Perelló Oliva
item.description:
@Spart wrote:

Axoloti + Korg Nanokontrol 2 sequencing Yamaha Reface CS.

Axoloti based sequencer: 8 steps, 3 lines of sequencer. Each line has individual control of: Resolution, backwards and forward, Octave up/down, note lenght (gate), swing and velocity.

The sequence could be transposable via Midi in note of the synth.

Its based on external led control possibilities of Korg Nanokontrol 2, that allows this visual sequencer.
It could run free or synced by Midi in clock.

I also developed an subpatch object that allows to use button + knob to acces to diffenent functions.
Also keep the value of the knob and wait to reach this value to get on.
This object increases the possibilities a lot

I´m thinking on next goals for this proyect:

-Scale selection
-Transpose in the same scale (not transposing the scale)
-More than 3 rate possibilities for sequence
-Random playing
-Gate per note
-Sequence Length selectable

Sequencer nanokontrol-eigth.axp (49.3 KB)

I think this subpatch objets will be needed

Dual KnobX3-OK.axs (12.2 KB)
sequencer8steps.axs (8.6 KB)

Read full topic
